table_caption: Interaction effect between the emotion (angry vs. happy) and task condition (inhibition vs. valance) factors on whole brain processes associated with the processing of no-go stimuli (0–500 ms post-stimulus onset).
table_foot: Note: Statistical significance was set for the significant voxels of activations at puncorr < 0.005. Activations highlighted in bold are corrected for multiple comparisons at pcorr < 0.05.
